headline.main: Carnival for Britain To Aid Bomb Relief; Entertainment Will Take Place at Radio City on Feb. 21

lead_paragraph: The American Theatre Wing of the British War Relief Society has arranged a "Carnival for Britain" to take place in Radio City on the night of Feb. 21. Proceeds from the fete will augment the society's fund to send emergency air-raid equipment to England.
abstract: Brit War Relief Soc Amer Theatre Wing benefit plans, N Y C
